title: bboybocuk
author: bboybocuk
content: Hello everyone. I'm buying expired Apple Developer Accounts. Price: 250 dollars.If you have any expired account and want to sell, you can contact me.I take the account first, then I pay the money. If you want payment first, sorry I can't pay 250 usd to everyone who text me. There is too much risk for me. But you will get the money after you give the account information. We're doing this job for a long timePayment method: Usdt (Cyripto)Telegram: https://t.me/AppleDeveloperTurkeyWhatsapp: https://wa.me/905362958430

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: bboybocuk on August 06, 2023, 11:29:47 AMI take the account first, then I pay the money. If you want payment first, sorry I can't pay 250 usd to everyone who text me. There is too much risk for me. But you will get the money after you give the account information. We're doing this job for a long timeWhat's the assurance that you will pay for the account after taking the account first? Nothing. You have no trade activities, no trusts at all as you are just newbie account. Why not do it with an escrow to secure both you and the seller.

comments.author: bboybocuk
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on August 06, 2023, 03:49:16 PMQuote from: bboybocuk on August 06, 2023, 11:29:47 AMI take the account first, then I pay the money. If you want payment first, sorry I can't pay 250 usd to everyone who text me. There is too much risk for me. But you will get the money after you give the account information. We're doing this job for a long timeWhat's the assurance that you will pay for the account after taking the account first? Nothing. You have no trade activities, no trusts at all as you are just newbie account. Why not do it with an escrow to secure both you and the seller.Yes I'm new here. We can use escrow no problem. But there is many scammers. I need to protect my self. If you have account, you can contact me on telegram
